item.title: temporary page
item.description:
In this lesson we will be plotting the data gathered in previous lessons. This is a temporary troubleshooting page

indplot<-ggplot(data=indiana)+                                                         # 1
  geom_line(aes(x=Year, y=Unemp_rate, colour=County_fips, group=County_fips)) +        # 2
  theme(legend.position="none",                                                        # 3
    axis.text.x=element_text(angle=45)) + ylab('Indiana Unemployment Rate by County')  # 4

indplot_monroe<-ggplot(indiana)+                                                                                           # 1
  geom_line(aes(x=Year, y=Unemp_rate, colour=County_fips, group=County_fips), alpha=0.7)+                                  # 2
  geom_line(data=monroecty, aes(x=Year, y=Unemp_rate, colour=County_fips, group=1), alpha=0.9, size=2, colour='black') +   # 3
  theme(legend.position="none",                                                                                            # 4
    axis.text.x=element_text(angle=45)) + ylab('Indiana Unemployment Rate by County')                                      # 5
